metadata.name: Suspicious File Drop by Exchange
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious file type dropped by an Exchange component in IIS

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\w3wp.exe')) AND contains(lower(actor.process.cmd_line), lower('msexchange')) AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.aspx')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.asp')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.ashx')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.ps1')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.bat')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.exe')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.dll')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.vbs'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious file type dropped by an Exchange component in IIS
